typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		value as (id as string, name as string, type as string, properties as (linkedServiceName as (referenceName as string, type as string), folder as (name as string), annotations as string[], type as string, typeProperties as (location as (type as string, fileName as string, folderPath as string, fileSystem as string), compressionCodec as string), schema as (name as string, type as string)[]), etag as string)[],
		nextLink as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
